content.question: The figure above shows the graph of <math alttext="y equals, 2 times cosine x " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and the line <math alttext="y equals 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="negative pi over 2, less than or equal to x, less than or equal to, pi over 2 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the sum of the areas of the shaded regions?

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from, negative pi over 2, to pi over 2, of, open parenthesis, 2 times cosine x, minus 1, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, negative pi over 2, to negative pi over 3, of, 2 times cosine x, d x, plus, the integral from, negative pi over 3, to pi over 3, of, 1, d x, plus, the integral from, pi over 3, to pi over 2, of, 2 times cosine x, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, negative pi over 2, to negative pi over 3, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, 2 times cosine x, close parenthesis, d x, plus, the integral from, negative pi over 3, to pi over 3, of, open parenthesis, 2 times cosine x, minus 1, close parenthesis, d x, plus, the integral from, pi over 3, to pi over 2, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, 2 times cosine x, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, negative pi over 2, to pi over 2, of, open parenthesis, 1 plus, 2 times cosine x, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the integral from, negative pi over 2, to negative pi over 3, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, 2 times cosine x, close parenthesis, d x, plus, the integral from, negative pi over 3, to pi over 3, of, open parenthesis, 2 times cosine x, minus 1, close parenthesis, d x, plus, the integral from, pi over 3, to pi over 2, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, 2 times cosine x, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.6: Finding the Area Between Curves That Intersect at More Than Two Points

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
